query:
SELECT g.id, g.nome, COUNT(l.id) as total_lojas 
FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON l.gestorId = g.id 
WHERE g.nome LIKE '%Fabio%' OR g.nome LIKE '%Fábio%'
GROUP BY g.id, g.nome;
command:

FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON l.gestorId = g.id
